text: is this still the best way to dive into the HubSpot CMS? I thought i read something following INBOUND that this would be revamped.
You’re looking at the new revamped track
coolio! wasn’t aware it was updated. Thanks!

Yea they are dropping the HubSpot Design Certification in favor of the Developer cert. and the dev cert is not yet available as they don’t have all the lessons set up yet that lead to it, so they are releasing each lesson as they go and will release the cert test and practicum after the lessons get put up
sounds logical. any sort of timeframe on that?
when it gets done. lol I don’t think there’s a concrete timeframe, I think they had hopes of getting it done in Q1 of next year but there’s a ton of work that goes into it
Hi Everyone - I'm new here and looking forward to learning from you all!
